EmailTemplate.name: 18-CSP-VoLTE-Email-Technical nurture-T0022J.Email 2 - Case Study 1
EmailTemplate.subject: How open APIs helped a CSP deploy its call blocking app
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> How open APIs helped a CSP deploy its call blocking app Nokia open Call Management Application Programming Interfaces (APIs) make it easy to introduce new services, cutting the time to market. Working with third-party developer Hiya, a leading North American CSP deployed an innovative nuisance call blocking app. Rapid, easy development and deployment was achieved through Nokia Telecom Application Server. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
